forecast.name: Today
forecast.longForecast: A chance of showers, mainly this morning. Highs in the mid 70s. South winds 5 to 10 mph. Gusts up to 25 mph this afternoon. Chance of rain 40 percent.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly cloudy with a slight chance of showers through midnight, then partly cloudy toward daybreak
forecast.longForecast: Lows around 60. Southwest winds 5 to 10 mph with gusts up to 20 mph, becoming northwest toward daybreak. Chance of rain 20 percent.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Partly cloudy in the morning, then clearing
forecast.longForecast: Highs in the upper 70s. Northwest winds 5 to 10 mph. Gusts up to 20 mph in the afternoon.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.longForecast: Lows in the mid 50s. Northwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Monday

forecast.name: Monday Night and Tuesday
